message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is the best offer you'll get!
Come on, Bob! Let's meet in the middle. 58-42 is a fair compromise.
It's getting late, Alice. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you one last chance to be reasonable.
